text: This is a listing of all the singles and albums released by Motown singing group The Four Tops. Throughout their career, 24 of their singles reached the Billboard Top 40 with seven of them reaching the top ten and two of them reaching #1 on the chart. An additional 21 have reached the UK Top 40 with ten reaching the top ten and one reaching #1 on the chart. Much of the group's catalog is now controlled by Universal Music Group, as a result of various transactions involving many of the record labels for which the Four Tops recorded for over the years. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ !
